mapper.sql: select student_id, academy, academic_score, competition_score, activity_score, lecture_score, tutorial_score from stu_ability_score
mapper.select: SELECT student_id, academy, -- 处理学术排名百分比，使用书院内学术排名的最大值作为分母 CASE WHEN max_academic_rank > 1 THEN ROUND( (max_academic_rank - academic_rank) * 100.0 / (max_academic_rank - 1), 2 ) ELSE 100.00 -- 当所有学生排名相同时（如并列第一），直接给满分 END AS academic_rank_percent, -- 同理处理其他排名百分比 CASE WHEN max_competition_rank > 1 THEN ROUND( (max_competition_rank - competition_rank) * 100.0 / (max_competition_rank - 1), 2 ) ELSE 100.00 END AS competition_rank_percent, CASE WHEN max_activity_rank > 1 THEN ROUND( (max_activity_rank - activity_rank) * 100.0 / (max_activity_rank - 1), 2 ) ELSE 100.00 END AS activity_rank_percent, lecture_score, tutorial_score FROM ( SELECT student_id, academy, lecture_score, tutorial_score, academic_rank, MAX(academic_rank) OVER (PARTITION BY academy) AS max_academic_rank, competition_rank, MAX(competition_rank) OVER (PARTITION BY academy) AS max_competition_rank, activity_rank, MAX(activity_rank) OVER (PARTITION BY academy) AS max_activity_rank FROM ( SELECT student_id, academy, academic_score, competition_score, activity_score, lecture_score, tutorial_score, -- 计算学术排名 RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY academy ORDER BY academic_score DESC) AS academic_rank, -- 计算竞赛排名 RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY academy ORDER BY competition_score DESC) AS competition_rank, -- 计算活动排名 RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY academy ORDER BY activity_score DESC) AS activity_rank FROM stu_ability_score WHERE academy = (SELECT academy FROM stu_ability_score WHERE student_id=#{studentId}) ) AS inner_sub ) AS outer_sub WHERE student_id=#{studentId};
